title: 🚉 "Instant gratification takes too long." - Carrie Fisher
content:
Write a function that truncates words in a string to length n.

Example:

let n = 3

> truncate('never gonna give you up', n)
> 'nev gon giv you up'

> truncate('*hello* darkness, my ~old_friend', n)
> '*hel* dar, my ~old_fri'
